thread.title: Fantastic boutique hotel in a perfect location
thread.title_full: Fantastic boutique hotel in a perfect location - Review of Hotel La Tamise - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: LittleLoudLucy
title: Fantastic boutique hotel in a perfect location
text: Completely agree with all the other reviews. Location is fantastic - I've stayed in a few different areas in Paris previously and this one is just so central to everything. The hotel is a small boutique hotel with extremely friendly and helpful staff who can't do enough for you. The room (although small) was very comfortable, nicely decorated and quiet. We had a minor issue with the hot water but a call down to the front desk and all was resolved with a big apology. Reasonably priced for such a great hotel/location and would 100% stay there again when we next go back to Paris.
